title: Whats with the complaining?
body:
Everyone is hating on AR URF for giving them a random champion?

Why is no one complaining about ARAM? From what i was able to deduce over the years _(and I'm no sherlock holmes)_ ARAM gives you a random champion too...
its just as equally unfair in ARAM when the enemy team gets bliz and kat and all the pokey champs, and you get all the melee ones. Yet we all still play ARAM from time to time with no complaints. So why are you only complaining about AR URF and not about ARAM?

You can hardly complain about one and not the other, seeming they are pretty much the same.

just because AR URF was released for the first time in history, and has been out for two days, doesn't in any way mean that old URF will forever never ever never be coming back, theres no need to be all protective.

So ffs just put a sock in it. 
Don't play the game modes you don't enjoy, and wait for the turn of the game modes you do enjoy. Simple.

replies.body: I liked normal URF because I got to play the champions I wanted to play in URF not stupid random shit that isn't fun

I like 3v3 ranked, but we don't always get what we want.

Remember that AR URF, doesn't 'replace' URF, its just a different take on it. _(like hexakill twisted treeline and summoners rift, they are different game modes)_
Mate do you think I care if it replaces it or not? No. I'm just saying that I don't like ARURF. You asked for an opinion, I gave mine.
Lol, i never asked for opinions.

"What's with the complaining"
You asked why people are complaining and I gave you my answer
He's not wrong lol, just because you don't like what he said, don't make him any wrong

If theres a whole room of people complaining about things, and someone walks through the door and says _"Woah guys, whats with all the complaining?"_ and then starts telling them not to complain. 
Is it expected that everyone in the room stops and each of them single file takes the time to explain the reason why they are complaining? No. 

Its a statement, not an actual question.

Yea....heres the deal aight, In aram, we don't have 80% cdr so the champs we get are as normal just in 1 lane, in other words, you won't get a champ that is complete shit, in URF you DO get 80% cdr and if you get it's on summoners rift, in other words, The enemy team can get lucky and have a zed on their team while you are stuck with a 1/9 Yasuo... See the difference?

Aram - Normal CDR
AR URF - 80% CDR
Aram- Normal champs
AR URF - Op champs
ARAM - Yasuo Not bad
AR URF - Yasuo Very bad
ARAM - No shit champions
AR URF - There are shit champions
ARAM - 15 min surrender
AR URF - 20 min surrender
ARAM - 1 lane
AR URF - 3 lanes

I can go one but you get the idea. Why would you fix something that isn't broken. If you can answer that, than pls, i would love to hear it

Obviously they aren't exactly the same game _(because that would be pointless)_

But its just as likely that YOU get the Zed and the enemy team gets the bad champs.
and equally as likely that you both get good champs or both get bad champs.

And in aram you can get champs that are complete shit.
Both Rengar and Kled leave a lot to be desired in aram, while Blitz, Xerath, Katarina etc etc are probably even stronger than they are in normal games.

And normal URF wasn't broken, but it was stale. Just like how mid lane is stale in normals atm _(Basically Yasuo vs Yasuo every game)_ and eventually people just stop playing it because no one wants to get raped by an Eve EVERY game.

Because they ruined the URF game mode. That's what aram is, a quick, one lane match with random champions. AR URF is URF where you are forced into a random champ, whether you want to play him, or like him which is most likely than not weak in this game mode and you're stuck in a 20 minutes game of feeling horrible because not only are you getting smashed, you also have a champion you don't even want to play, and URF is ruined. URF was fine, people played whatever they wanted, even if you were losing, it was still fun, the current version is just a horrible 20 minute one champ carry.

Yea.. no. its still the same as aram.

Its quick
Its random
Its one champ carry
Youre playing a champ you've never played
That champ sucks in that game mode

yup.... sounds pretty identical to me

And no, this hasn't ruined urf... its a different game mode. _(just like hexakill summoners rift and hexakill TT are different, and the two one for alls are different)_

The power gap between good and bad champs is much worse, that is why people hate the random aspect.

Also we won't take you seriously if you post on the boards with a level 9 account.
and yet you are complaining about people complaining lol.

Yea.. but i never said that was wrong?

This post is about people complaining about AR URF, I'm not doing that.

Your point?
I just don't see the point in you complaining about some people complaining about the game mode lol. What does it even have to do with you? Did you make Ar urf? Nope lol
